{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Instant Router (AFi-INS-R).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AmpliFi Instant Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.amplifi.com/instant |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = AFi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = INS-R |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = SWX-AFIR |icid = 6545A-AFIR |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9563; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 750 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FZ2I-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6SB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8334; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.7 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, LCD screen, |addchip = Bluetooth 4.0 + HS Chip;Atheros;AR3012;;1;,,, 802.11b/g/n Power Amplifier, LNA and Tx/Rx/BT Switch;Anadigics;AWL9293;;2;,,, 802.11an/ac Power Amplifier, LNA and Tx/Rx Switch;Anadigics;AWL9581;;2;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller w/Embedded ICE and ISP;SONiX;SN8F26E611L;;1;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;2;,,, 3A, 5V, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;M3Tek;MT3058;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/08/2018 |estreldate = 10/2018 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAE87A2Y5722 |asin = B07HHGBHQG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ubiquiti;QCA9882;Ubiquiti, U-AME-G1-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = integrated |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Also bundled with the [[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Instant Meshpoint (AFi-INS-P)|AmpliFi Instant MeshPoint]] as AmpliFi Instant
==Links of Interest== *[https://amplifi.com/docs/AmpliFi_Instant_Datasheet.pdf AmpliFi Instant Datasheet]
===Reviews=== * [https://www.androidguys.com/reviews/hardware-reviews/ubiquiti-amplifi-instant-review/ Review on '''AndroidGuys'''] * [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/ubiquiti-amplifi-instant Review on '''techradar'''] * [https://9to5mac.com/2018/11/09/review-amplify-instant-mesh-wifi-router/ Review on '''9TO5Mac''']
==See also== *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Router (AFi-R)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFR SWX-AFR] • IC ID: 6545A-AFR *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi MeshPoint (AFi-P)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFP SWX-AFP] • IC ID: 6545A-AFP *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD MeshPoint (AFi-P-HD)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFPHD SWX-AFPHD] • IC ID: 6545A-AFPHD *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Instant Router (AFi-INS-R)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFPHD SWX-AFIR] • IC ID: 6545A-AFIR *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Instant Meshpoint (AFi-INS-P)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFPHD SWX-AFIP] • IC ID: 6545A-AFIP
